casebody.data:
Jerry Clyde BEELER v. STATE of OKLAHOMA. No. 6370. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. June 2, 1960. Charles F. Brega, Denver, Colo., for appellant. Mac Q. Williamson, Atty. Gen., of Oklahoma, and Owen J. Watts, Asst. Atty. Gen., of Oklahoma, for appellee.

Before BRATTON, PICKETT and LEWIS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
